profileAlternative.name: Tacettin ARICI
profileAlternative.headline: Data Science & ML
profileAlternative.summary:
With over 3 years of experience in Data Science, i have worked in various related data-driven projects.
I am highly experienced on analysis and generating insightful reports and Machine Learning Model implementations to the companies. I have also provided hands-on consulting and tutoring services on a wide range of STEM subjects like math, statistics, data science, operations research, calculus, algebra, and project management over two years during my teaching assistant period.
WHY DATA SCIENCE-AI
Data driven methods are the most powerful way to enhance the quality of life and help build a better future !



TECHNICAL SKILLS
• Statistical Machine Learning Algorithms, Linear and Logistic Regression, Decision Tree, K Means clustering, Support Vector Machine (SVM), Random Forest, XGBoost, Ensemble methods, Deep Learning, Big Data, NLP, GAN, PCA, t-SNE
• Tools: Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Sci-kitLearn, Pyspark, Statsmodel, TensorFlow, NLTK, RE, BeatifulSoup4, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Plotly, Cufflinks, Choropleth, GitHub/Git, Spark, AWS Cloud Services, Pytorch, Tensorflow, Teapot, H2O, AutoML, Orange, Tableau
• Programming: Python, R, MySQL, PostgreSQL

positions.title: Data Scientist
positions.description:
• Apply XGBoost, Random Forest, and Linear Regression Models to establish the creditworthiness and trust score of individuals from financial, personal and community perspectives
• Utilized feature selection and decreased 40 features to 15 features, which increased accuracy of models
• Analyze data to understand existing operation in order to develop and recommend actionable solutions

items: A FUZZY COGNITIVE MAP APPROACH TO PREDICT THE CHROMOSOMAL ABNORMALITIES BY USING THE TRIPLE TEST MARKERS AND DEMOGRAPHIC FACTORS
Estimation of Areal Weight, Grab Tensile Strength and Elongation at Break of PP Spunbond Nonwovens using Digital Image Analysis and Artificial Neural Networks
Estimation of Areal Weight, Grab Tensile Strength and Elongation at Break of PP Spunbond Nonwovens using Digital Image Analysis and Artificial Neural Networks
